languages.text: "Рекомендовано развертывание укрепленных исследовательских станций в пораженных секторах. Преимущество более обширного сбора информации оправдывает повышенный уровень потерь среди обслуживающего персонала".
"Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."
languages.original_text: "Рекомендовано развертывание укрепленных исследовательских станций в пораженных секторах. Преимущество более обширного сбора информации оправдывает повышенный уровень потерь среди обслуживающего персонала".

traits.locale_text: "The deployment of the fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among the personnel."
"The deployment of the fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among the personnel."
"Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."
"Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."
"Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."
"Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

languages.text: “建议在受灾地区部署加固的研究站。考虑到收集更多信息带来的益处，额外的人员伤亡是可以承受的。”
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

traits.locale_text: “建议在受灾地区部署加固的研究站。考虑到收集更多信息带来的益处，额外的人员伤亡是可以承受的。”

languages.text: «Se recomienda el despliegue de estaciones de investigación fortificadas en los sectores afectados. El beneficio de recabar más información justifica el aumento de bajas entre el personal».
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

traits.locale_text: «Se recomienda el despliegue de estaciones de investigación fortificadas en los sectores afectados. El beneficio de recabar más información justifica el aumento de bajas entre el personal».

languages.text: 「影響を受けたセクターに強化された研究ステーションを配備することが推奨されています。多くの情報を収集するメリットが分かれば、人員の死傷率の増加も正当化できるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

traits.locale_text: 「影響を受けたセクターに強化された研究ステーションを配備することが推奨されています。多くの情報を収集するメリットが分かれば、人員の死傷率の増加も正当化できるでしょう」

languages.text: « Recommandation : déploiement de stations de recherche fortifiées dans les secteurs touchés. Cela impliquera un taux de mortalité plus élevé parmi le personnel, mais la somme d'informations qu'il sera possible de récolter justifie un tel sacrifice. »
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

traits.locale_text: « Recommandation : déploiement de stations de recherche fortifiées dans les secteurs touchés. Cela impliquera un taux de mortalité plus élevé parmi le personnel, mais la somme d'informations qu'il sera possible de récolter justifie un tel sacrifice. »

languages.text: "Der Einsatz befestigter Forschungsstationen in den betroffenen Sektoren wird empfohlen. Die dadurch zusätzlich gesammelten Informationen rechtfertigen die höhere Verlustrate beim Personal."
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."

traits.locale_text: "Der Einsatz befestigter Forschungsstationen in den betroffenen Sektoren wird empfohlen. Die dadurch zusätzlich gesammelten Informationen rechtfertigen die höhere Verlustrate beim Personal."

languages.text: "Etkilenen sektörlerde tahkim edilmiş araştırma istasyonlarının kurulması öneriliyor. Daha fazla bilgi toplamanın sağlayacağı fayda, personel zayiatının artmasını meşru kılacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Deployment of fortified research stations in the affected sectors is recommended. The benefit of gathering more information justifies the increased casualty rate among personnel."
